info.title: Consolidation Task Group Assignment - Read
info.description: The service enables you to read assignments of a consolidation task group to a data monitor and to a consolidation monitor. This assignment depends on the consolidation version, fiscal year, period, and period category.

x-sap-shortText: Read consolidation task group assignment configurations in group reporting using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Data Collection Integration(SAP_COM_0241)
Finance - Cloud Consolidation Task for Group Reporting Integration(SAP_COM_0903)
[Group Reporting - Data from SAP Group Reporting Data Collection(287)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/287 " Link To BP ")
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems(2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")
